Title: Establishes the domestic violence accountability program
Summary: Establishes the domestic violence accountability program; requires mandatory domestic violence counseling.
LawCode: Add §459-i, Soc Serv L; add §60.38, Pen L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to establishing the domestic violence accountability program; and to amend the penal law, in relation to mandatory domestic violence counseling
